idea-plugin.name: FluentAssertions
idea-plugin.description:
Support plugin for FluentAssertions. A very extensive set of extension methods that allow you to more naturally specify the expected outcome of a TDD or BDD-style unit tests.

  • Postfix template .result for easier standardization of tests
  • Postfix template .testee for easier standardization of tests
  • Live template should to introduce a new assertion for either result or the last asserted expression
